## Enumerations

### enum  {#ab40cbf8243fad70968f9ecf82f48a035}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="enum llvm::Comdat::SelectionKind ">

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="ab40cbf8243fad70968f9ecf82f48a035a8c4ae4df3d085db275a58182612ff3be" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Any">
The linker may choose any COMDAT
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ab40cbf8243fad70968f9ecf82f48a035acceb065ea69a5e06e80bd6ceddd7b9a7" />
<EnumerationListItem name="ExactMatch">
The data referenced by the COMDAT must be the same
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ab40cbf8243fad70968f9ecf82f48a035a2444b05a47619decc80c2ce0cc224dc8" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Largest">
The linker will choose the largest COMDAT
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ab40cbf8243fad70968f9ecf82f48a035ab2d0d4bc9ba11b7324f5ffc20a9dc37a" />
<EnumerationListItem name="NoDeduplicate">
No deduplication is performed
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="ab40cbf8243fad70968f9ecf82f48a035a8b148d3d05688ddb23b7abb81527b7ce" />
<EnumerationListItem name="SameSize">
The data referenced by the COMDAT must be the same size
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>
